name: peerweb
description: Decentralized website hosting powered by WebTorrent - Host static websites through peer-to-peer networks without centralized servers

scripts.minify:check: node -e "const fs=require('fs'); const orig=fs.statSync('peerweb.js').size; const min=fs.statSync('peerweb.min.js').size; console.log(`Original: ${(orig/1024).toFixed(2)}KB, Minified: ${(min/1024).toFixed(2)}KB, Reduction: ${((1-min/orig)*100).toFixed(2)}%`)"
scripts.validate: node -e "console.log('Validating project structure...'); const fs=require('fs'); const required=['index.html','peerweb.js','peerweb-sw.js']; const missing=required.filter(f=>!fs.existsSync(f)); if(missing.length){console.error('Missing:',missing.join(', ')); process.exit(1);} console.log('âœ“ All required files present');"
